casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher MOSBY 518P98-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Christopher Mosby, for Mosby, Christopher Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of October 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
